spirit:addressBlock.spirit:name: some_register_map
spirit:addressBlock.spirit:description: This address map contains some example registers to show how RDL can be utilized in various situations.

spirit:register.spirit:name: ICU_CFG_x_0
spirit:register.spirit:description: Interrupt 0 to 63 Configuration Registers

spirit:field.spirit:name: CPU7_INT16
spirit:field.spirit:description: <var processor: application> core7 interrupt 1 = route to core7 interrupt

spirit:field.spirit:name: CPU6_INT17
spirit:field.spirit:description: <var processor: application> core6 interrupt 1 = route to core6 interrupt

spirit:field.spirit:name: CPU5_INT18
spirit:field.spirit:description: <var processor: application> core5 interrupt 1 = route to core5 interrupt

spirit:field.spirit:name: CPU4_INT19
spirit:field.spirit:description: <var processor: application> core4 interrupt 1 = route to core4 interrupt

spirit:field.spirit:name: CPU3_INT21
spirit:field.spirit:description: <var processor: application> core3 interrupt 1 = route to core3 interrupt

spirit:field.spirit:name: CPU2_INT22
spirit:field.spirit:description: <var processor: application> core2 interrupt 1 = route to core2 interrupt

spirit:field.spirit:name: CPU1_INT23
spirit:field.spirit:description: <var processor: application> core1 interrupt 1 = route to core1 interrupt

spirit:field.spirit:name: CPU0_INT24
spirit:field.spirit:description: <var processor: application> core0 interrupt 1 = route to core0 interrupt

spirit:field.spirit:name: IRQ_FIQ26
spirit:field.spirit:description: irq/fiq 1 = route to irq 0 = route to fiq

spirit:field.spirit:name: PRIORITY_MASKING27
spirit:field.spirit:description: priority/masking 0xf to 0x1 = interrupt arbitration priority 0x0 = interrupt is masked

spirit:field.spirit:name: PRIORITY_MASKING47
spirit:field.spirit:description: priority/masking 0xf to 0x1 = interrupt arbitration priority 0x0 = interrupt is masked

spirit:register.spirit:name: ICU_INT_STATUS_0
spirit:register.spirit:description: Interrupt Status Register 0

spirit:field.spirit:name: INT_STATUS_0
spirit:field.spirit:description: interrupt status [31:0] (after masking) 0 = interrupt is not pending 1 = interrupt is pending

spirit:register.spirit:name: ICU_INT_STATUS_1
spirit:register.spirit:description: Interrupt Status Register 1

spirit:field.spirit:name: INT_STATUS_1
spirit:field.spirit:description: interrupt status [63:32] (after masking) 0 = interrupt is not pending 1 = interrupt is pending

spirit:register.spirit:name: ICU_INT_STATUS_2
spirit:register.spirit:description: Interrupt Status Register 2

spirit:field.spirit:name: INT_STATUS_2
spirit:field.spirit:description: interrupt status [95:64] (after masking) 0 = interrupt is not pending 1 = interrupt is pending

spirit:register.spirit:name: ICU_INT_STATUS_3
spirit:register.spirit:description: Interrupt Status Register 3

spirit:field.spirit:name: INT_STATUS_3
spirit:field.spirit:description: interrupt status [127:96] (after masking) 0 = interrupt is not pending 1 = interrupt is pending

spirit:field.spirit:description: selected interrupt number

spirit:register.spirit:name: ICU_ARM_INT_MSK
spirit:register.spirit:description: ARM Interrupt Mask Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: AP_L2_INT_MASK
spirit:field.spirit:description: ap l2 int mask 0 = interrupt is not masked 1 = interrupt is masked. currently it's not used.

spirit:field.spirit:name: AP_C2_COMMIRQ_MASK
spirit:field.spirit:description: ap cluster2 2 cores commirq mask 0 = interrupt is not masked 1 = interrupt is masked

spirit:field.spirit:name: AP_C2_AXIERR_MASK
spirit:field.spirit:description: ap cluster2 axierr mask 0 = interrupt is not masked 1 = interrupt is masked

spirit:field.spirit:name: CCI_EVNTCNTOVERFLOW_MASK
spirit:field.spirit:description: cci evntcntoverflow mask 0 = interrupt is not masked 1 = interrupt is masked

spirit:field.spirit:name: CCI_ERRORIRQ_MASK
spirit:field.spirit:description: cci errorirq mask 0 = interrupt is not masked 1 = interrupt is masked

spirit:field.spirit:name: AP_C1_COMMIRQ_MASK
spirit:field.spirit:description: ap cluster1 4 cores commirq mask 0 = interrupt is not masked 1 = interrupt is masked

spirit:field.spirit:name: AP_C1_AXIERR_MASK
spirit:field.spirit:description: ap cluster1 axierr mask 0 = interrupt is not masked 1 = interrupt is masked

spirit:field.spirit:name: AP_C0_COMMIRQ_MASK
spirit:field.spirit:description: ap cluster0 4 cores commirq mask 0 = interrupt is not masked 1 = interrupt is masked

spirit:field.spirit:name: AP_C0_AXIERR_MASK
spirit:field.spirit:description: ap cluster0 axierr mask 0 = interrupt is not masked 1 = interrupt is masked

spirit:field.spirit:name: CP_L2_UECC_INT_MSK
spirit:field.spirit:description: seagull l2 uecc interrupt mask 0 = interrupt is not masked 1 = interrupt is masked

spirit:field.spirit:name: CP_L2_ECC_INT_MSK
spirit:field.spirit:description: seagull l2 ecc interrupt mask 0 = interrupt is not masked 1 = interrupt is masked

spirit:field.spirit:name: CP_L2_PA_ECC_INT_MSK
spirit:field.spirit:description: seagull l2 pa ecc interrupt mask 0 = interrupt is not masked 1 = interrupt is masked

spirit:register.spirit:name: CP_WDT_INT_CLR
spirit:register.spirit:description: CP WDT interrupt clear

spirit:field.spirit:name: CP_WDT_INT_AP_CLR
spirit:field.spirit:description: ap internal clearing of cp_wdt_irq. 1 = ap internally clear the cp_wdt (cp_wdt_irq origin is not cleared). 0 = no action

spirit:field.spirit:name: CP_WDT_INT_SENSE
spirit:field.spirit:description: cp wdt int selection. 0 = use original cp_wdt interrupt. 1 = use the ap internal cleared cp_wdt interrupt

spirit:register.spirit:name: ICU_INT_WAKEUP_MASK
spirit:register.spirit:description: ICU Interrupt Wakeup Mask

spirit:field.spirit:name: ICU_INT_WAKEUP_TO_AP_CORE9_MSK
spirit:field.spirit:description: icu int wakeup to ap core9 mask 1 = mask

spirit:field.spirit:name: ICU_INT_WAKEUP_TO_AP_CORE8_MSK
spirit:field.spirit:description: icu int wakeup to ap core8 mask 1 = mask

spirit:field.spirit:name: ICU_INT_WAKEUP_TO_AP_CORE7_MSK
spirit:field.spirit:description: icu int wakeup to ap core7 mask 1 = mask

spirit:field.spirit:description: icu int wakeup to ap core6 mask 1 = mask

spirit:field.spirit:name: ICU_INT_WAKEUP_TO_AP_CORE5_MSK
spirit:field.spirit:description: icu int wakeup to ap core5 mask 1 = mask

spirit:field.spirit:name: ICU_INT_WAKEUP_TO_AP_CORE4_MSK
spirit:field.spirit:description: icu int wakeup to ap core4 mask 1 = mask

spirit:field.spirit:name: ICU_INT_WAKEUP_TO_AP_CORE3_MSK
spirit:field.spirit:description: icu int wakeup to ap core3 mask 1 = mask

spirit:field.spirit:name: ICU_INT_WAKEUP_TO_AP_CORE2_MSK
spirit:field.spirit:description: icu int wakeup to ap core2 mask 1 = mask

spirit:field.spirit:name: ICU_INT_WAKEUP_TO_AP_CORE1_MSK
spirit:field.spirit:description: icu int wakeup to ap core1 mask 1 = mask

spirit:field.spirit:name: ICU_INT_WAKEUP_TO_AP_CORE0_MSK
spirit:field.spirit:description: icu int wakeup to ap core0 mask 1 = mask

spirit:register.spirit:name: ICU_DMA_NON_SEC_AP_CORES_INT_ST
spirit:register.spirit:description: DMA Non-secure Interrupt to AP Cores Status Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: DMA_NON_SEC_AP_CORES_INT_STATUS
spirit:field.spirit:description: dma non-secure interrupt to ap cores interrupt status this field contains one bit for each dma channel interrupt that is pending (after masking). 0 = dma interrupt is not pending 1 = dma interrupt is pending

spirit:register.spirit:name: ICU_DMA_NON_SEC_AP_INT_MSK
spirit:register.spirit:description: DMA Non-secure Interrupt to AP Cores Mask Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: DMA_NON_SEC_AP_CORES_INT_MASK
spirit:field.spirit:description: dma non-secure interrupt mask to ap cores. this field contains one bit for each dma channel interrupt mask. 1 = interrupt is masked

spirit:register.spirit:name: ICU_DMA_SEC_AP_CORES_INT_ST
spirit:register.spirit:description: DMA Secure Interrupt to AP Cores Status Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: DMA_SEC_AP_CORES_INT_STATUS
spirit:field.spirit:description: dma secure interrupt to ap cores interrupt status this field contains one bit for each dma channel interrupt that is pending (after masking). 0 = dma interrupt is not pending 1 = dma interrupt is pending

spirit:register.spirit:name: ICU_DMA_SEC_AP_INT_MSK
spirit:register.spirit:description: DMA Secure Interrupt to AP Cores Mask Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: DMA_SEC_AP_CORES_INT_MASK
spirit:field.spirit:description: dma secure interrupt mask to ap cores. this field contains one bit for each dma channel interrupt mask. 1 = interrupt is masked
